captions.text:
Ha! I want to run away
Somewhere with a Top open car!

I want to push away the things
I have and go away with the wind

The song coming from Radio
I hum a song

Throw away meaningless worries
No more, let yourself go

Schedule fit like a puzzle
You're always chased by time

So you've forgot about
Romance and departure

Excuse me,
Do you have time?

Should we leave? Cancun Ibiza
Don't hesitate, this is the moment
Give me the green light

(Wo wo wo wo)
Give me the green light

(Wo wo wo wo)
Yeah, Get away
Get away, Get away, Get away

Worry about tomorrow late
Why do you worry about it all day No!

What are you hesitating
If this moment goes by
The same tomorrow will come

I get on the car mesmerized
And I start the car

I step on the clutch and push
It up to the 1st gear, push the floor

Today you and your Drive away fits
I go here and there well

Left hand is on handle
Right hand on gearshift
Sometimes Grab your hands
Everyday like a tight tie

I can't breathe and today is reply
Like yesterday

Give me the green ligh
I want to see it tonight

Those shining stars shining better
Than a neon sign,
The color of this city is thick
That's that Thang I don't like

I dance all night with the
Base in the back

Should I go away on a trip on
The opposite way

Forget about the worries
And postponed all the things behind

Let's get away from this 
Dizzy place

Give me the green light
(Wo wo wo wo)

Give me the green light
(Wo wo wo wo)

Yeah, Get away
Get away, Get away, Get away

Worry about tomorrow later
Why do you worry about it all day No!

My heart is fluttering like crazy
This is heaven

Forget about today's worries
This is a present

You can get it to
Where should we go

The mountain and sea
Anywhere is fine

You can just have good
Imagination with words
Give me the green light
(Wo wo wo wo)Give me the green light

(Wo wo wo wo)
Yeah, Get away
Get away, Get away, Get away

Worry about tomorrow later
Why do you worry about it all day No!
Give me the green light
(Wo wo wo wo)Give me the green light
(Wo wo wo wo)Yeah, Get away
Get away, Get away, Get away

Worry about tomorrow later
Why do you worry about it all day No!

comments.text:
I'm so done with everyone thinking that whenever a song has a tinge of rnb 
influence in it, that it automatically reminds them of Zion T. PEOPLE ZION 
T DID NOT COIN AN ENTIRE GENRE OF MUSIC, IT'S CALLED SOUL AND RNB. Please 
do some research on the origins of rnb, and realize who it really sounds 
like. Don't get me wrong I love Zion T and this song, but I think people 
are unclear on what rnb really is. ﻿

comments.text:
It's really interesting that there are three mature, fully grown men in 
this group but suddenly a 19 year old kid pops up (i'm not saying he's no 
good). This combination is quite odd, but I don't find it uncomfortable. It 
just feels refreshing and this kid is oddly compatible with the other 
three...like you're enjoying something ripe but something unexpectedly 
fresh and sour streaks across your tongue...lol﻿

comments.text:
I listen to the song first before i watch the MV and I already like the 
song alone. its pretty catchy to start the day. but after I watch the MV, I 
got even more surprised 'cause they're all cool and fun when they deliver 
the music. at least the MV made me feel that way. and its pretty hard to 
pull off this concept without being cliché. everyone pulls it off 
precisely. great work, everyone!﻿
